title: Oxalic acid - identify conjugate acid-base pair

content.question:
H2C2O4(aq) + H2O(l)  ⇄  H3O+(aq) + HC2O4-(aq)

HC2O4-(aq) + H2O(l)  ⇄  H3O+(aq) + C2O42-(aq)

H2O(l) + H2O(l)   ⇄  H3O+(aq) + OH- (aq)

All the reactions represented above occur in an aqueous solution of oxalic acid. Which of the following represent a Brønsted-Lowry conjugate acid-base pair?

skill.text: 1.B: Describe the components of and quantitative information from models and representations that illustrate both particulate-level and macroscopic- level properties.
